events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car on the morning of May 1st, requesting immediate assistance for the accident claim.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision and damage reported.
An agent was assigned to the case to handle the auto accident claim, ensuring personalized follow-up and support.
The customer was contacted and the claim was formally acknowledged, providing reassurance and next steps for the vehicle damage process.
Additional documents including the police report, photos of the car damage, and driver’s license were requested to proceed with the investigation.
The customer successfully submitted all required documents electronically, facilitating a smoother claim investigation process.
The investigation into the vehicle collision began, including verification of accident details and assessment of the damage extent.
Completion of the investigation confirmed the collision parameters and established liability, moving the claim towards settlement.
A settlement proposal was presented to the customer covering the repairs and related expenses following the auto accident evaluation.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the offered compensation amount.
The insurance claim was officially approved post customer agreement, verifying all documentation and evaluations.
Payments for the approved auto accident claim were processed and transferred to the customer’s designated bank account.
The claim was officially closed after successful resolution and full payment issuance to the claimant.
All claim documents and records were archived securely for future reference in compliance with company policy.
